mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, comm_idx, board_uidx, board_scope, board_title, board_content, reg_date, modify_date, board_stat_cd, (SELECT conf_name FROM dec_conf WHERE conf_type = 'BOARD_SCOP' AND conf_type_cd = board_stat_cd) as board_stat_nm, (SELECT login_id FROM dec_user u WHERE u.user_idx = board_uidx) AS writer_id, (SELECT nick_name FROM dec_user u WHERE u.user_idx = board_uidx) AS writer_nick FROM dec_community_board WHERE comm_idx = #{comm_idx}
